00071 class OPENMM_EXPORT CustomTorsionForce : public Force {
00072 public:
00079     explicit CustomTorsionForce(const std::string& energy);
00083     int getNumTorsions() const {
00084         return torsions.size();
00085     }
00089     int getNumPerTorsionParameters() const {
00090         return parameters.size();
00091     }
00095     int getNumGlobalParameters() const {
00096         return globalParameters.size();
00097     }
00101     const std::string& getEnergyFunction() const;
00105     void setEnergyFunction(const std::string& energy);
00112     int addPerTorsionParameter(const std::string& name);
00119     const std::string& getPerTorsionParameterName(int index) const;
00126     void setPerTorsionParameterName(int index, const std::string& name);
00134     int addGlobalParameter(const std::string& name, double defaultValue);
00141     const std::string& getGlobalParameterName(int index) const;
00148     void setGlobalParameterName(int index, const std::string& name);
00155     double getGlobalParameterDefaultValue(int index) const;
00162     void setGlobalParameterDefaultValue(int index, double defaultValue);
00173     int addTorsion(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, const std::vector<double>& parameters);
00184     void getTorsionParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, int& particle3, int& particle4, std::vector<double>& parameters) const;
00195     void setTorsionParameters(int index, int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, const std::vector<double>& parameters);
00196 protected:
00197     ForceImpl* createImpl();
00198 private:
00199     class TorsionInfo;
00200     class TorsionParameterInfo;
00201     class GlobalParameterInfo;
00202     std::string energyExpression;
00203     std::vector<TorsionParameterInfo> parameters;
00204     std::vector<GlobalParameterInfo> globalParameters;
00205     std::vector<TorsionInfo> torsions;
00206 };

00212 class CustomTorsionForce::TorsionInfo {
00213 public:
00214     int particle1, particle2, particle3, particle4;
00215     std::vector<double> parameters;
00216     TorsionInfo() : particle1(-1), particle2(-1), particle3(-1), particle4(-1) {
00217     }
00218     TorsionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, const std::vector<double>& parameters) :
00219             particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), particle3(particle3), particle4(particle4), parameters(parameters) {
00220     }
00221 };
